item.title: Next Open NeuroFedora meeting: 22 September 2025 1300 UTC

item.title: Packaging changes at NeuroFedora
item.description: The NeuroFedora team has decided to make a couple of changes to the artefacts that we produce and maintain. Please read the post for details.
item.dc:creator: Ankur
